parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   5
*   10
*   20

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword that is used to search for permission templates.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The tenant ID. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.
